post:
As others know, I postponed the raffle for this day (28). As this thread http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/comment/826983#Comment_826983 , the prizes are:

    3 (edit: +2) domains with 50 GApps users! (Thanks @TheKiller !)
    2gb miami, or uk xen pv or hvm plan for a year (Thanks @AnthonySmith !)
    free year of CloudCommando (Thanks @0xdragon !)
    One free KVM Ci5 - 1GB RAM service (any location) [$40 value] (Thanks @GoodHosting !)
Rules:

Minimum $3 USD. I will issue a ticket for every $3 you donate (or get a friend to donate, too!)
Publish the email with the PayPal payment
The PayPal email is: shak@shak.org.uk
EDIT 3: Per @GoodHosting request:

Start date: 12/1/2014 00:00 GMT End date: 12/29/2014 20:30 GMT -6 (or Mexico City time)

The numbers will be generated randomly between 1000 and 1200. Then, with a list, I will generate random numbers until each random number matches the list.

The raffle will begin 29/December/2014, 9PM GMT -6, and I will stop counting the donations 30 minutes before.

The domains are .com in GoDaddy, will push the domain to your GoDaddy account or give you the EPP code.

Have a great day!

EDIT 1: PayPal added.

Edit 2: @TheKiller has donated 2 more domains with 50 GApps!

Edit 3: Added additional prices, as @AnthonySmith , @0xdragon , and @GoodHosting request. Also, added start and end date.
